mean_cn: v. 贬低；降低品格（身价、价值等）
mean_en: to show or treat somebody in a way that makes them seem not worth any respect or not worth taking seriously
sentence: The mayor degraded himself in the eyes of the people when he accepted a bribe.
sentence_trans: 市长收受贿赂时，他已经贬低了自己在人民眼中的形象。
word_etyma: de向下 + grade步，级 → 向下降级 → 降级；退化
